name: InfiNight (itch)
description:
InfiNight is an infinite runner made in only 6 hours! It's generally pretty simple, but instead of the normal 3-lane infinite runners you're used to, this one has 9 lanes! Probably a little bit rage-inducive... so... :P

Check out my other stuff and keep in touch here! :D

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/c/Icosogames
